node.text: We're taking a break next week for the holidays, but will be back with more Translators of the World on December 30th. In the meantime, for those who celebrate it, we wish you all a very merry Christmas?

Matthew Roudebush decided to drop everything to pursue his passion in language. Hailing from a small town in Midwest USA, after studying abroad a year in Italy, he found his gift and vocation: culture and language. He left linguistics in an American university in favor of immersing himself in a Peruvian, 3-year program for translation and interpretation, without looking back. He prides himself in his spot-on interpretation, accurately relaying more than mere content, but also powerfully conveying the underlying soft message. In his free time, he loves to support the Rotary Youth Exchange Program, working with nearly 100 students each year, bridging cultures and teaching language. Not only that, but what better way to work between cultures than fostering an intercultural relationship with his beautiful wife.  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

I spent part of my childhood in Prague andattended a Czech school. Early on, I figured out I had a knack for languages. I went on to master English, and learn French, Spanish and now, Greek. I completed two postgraduate degrees in translation and interpreting, the latest being an MA from the University of Leeds. 
My real professional kickstart was with European Union twinning projects in real estate taxation and accounting and auditing in Cairo, where I also acquired administrative and project management skills. Now I enjoy freelance life and have my own website: https://lnkd.in/eG8iV82. 
#translation #interpreting #interpreters #interpreterlife #englisharabic #arabicenglish #spanisharabic #meraki #merakilanguageservices #EU #twinningprojects #arabicinterpreter #arabictranslators #proofreading #editing #freelance #xl8 #t9n #l10n #conferenceinterpreting

I combine my linguistic competency with my extensive knowledge and expertise in the medical, legal and technical fields to produce an authentic target language version with focus on accuracy, consistency and appealing to the target reader. I am a smart researcher who knows perfectly how to find the exact equivalent for any sophisticated technical jargon. 
My clients love my honesty to the source, my organized style and attention to minute details. My medical translation facilitates the communication between doctors and their patients. My translation of agreements and legal cases help people manage their business. My localization increases the application’s availability in the Arab market.

#arabictranslation  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

A solution-oriented translator and reviewer with a background in corporate IT, specializing in the IT, technical, and legal fields.Coming from a very diverse educational and professional background (ancient languages, arts and culture, and IT), I offer linguistic services in the IT, technological, and legal spheres. I work from Bulgarian and English into German as well as from English and German into Bulgarian. #translation #IT #tech # legal #Freiplan #SAP #corporate #hardware #software #contracts #usermanuals  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

After a fulfilling career of about fifteen years as a Spanish teacher, Georges returned to his first love, translation, which he considers an art. Following a series of opportunities, he spent a year in Oviedo (Spain), then he moved to the land of his ancestors, Reunion Island (France). Holder of a Master's degree in Literature and Language studies, he's now a sworn translator and also works for various international organizations via Translators Without Borders. Passionate about political narrative and author of academic papers, he'd love to translate essays and/or biographies.

#sworntranslator #legaltranslation #interpretation #proofreading #localization #freelancetranslator #world #ReunionIsland #languages #French #Spanish #English #internationalorganizations #politics #passion 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

Alicia is from Barcelona and she also translates into Catalan, although Spanish is her first language. After 15 years working in-house, she opened her freelance translation business Prêt-à-translate on July 2016. 
She loves localization and marketing: “I think it’s a great combination, being able to localize a product and then help to market it through different channels”. Alicia loves spending time with her dogs, Frodo and Noire, and playing board games with her husband and friends. Her favourite ones are Seven Wonders Duel, Azul and Ticket to Ride. She also likes cooking and beer. Well, who doesn’t? 
#localization #transcreation #software #websites #apps #tourism #fashion #ecommerce #elearning #pretatranslate #translationisinstyle  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

5 years of translation experience led Vitor into a full-time freelance career. Avoid the serious problems that come from bad translations! If you want your patent licensing agreement, contract, internal regulation, or other legal documents carefully translated into Portuguese, he can give you a hand. Having studied in the USA, he has acquired first-hand knowledge of the country’s language and culture and will be a great choice to translate your texts from that variant. His university courses on Literature, Translation and Creative Writing have also made him a literary translator, publishing some of his works at a blog called Leve Mediocridade. 
#LegalTranslation #Roraima #Tradução #BrazilianPortuguese #Business  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

Claudia has seen and loved the etiquette and wit of British teahouses, and the rituals and wisdom of Chinese ones. She loves history, archaeology and hanging around Medieval faires and markets. She wrote a Chinese grammar users' manual for university students called 'Cinese per Pessimisti' and she blogs for them about laughter and tears of learning Chinese. She also writes on bilingual trade magazines. 
#italiantranslator #teacupt9n #chinese #medicaltranslator #technicaltranslator #learnchinese #languagelearning #cineseperpessimisti #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

I am an English to Spanish (and vice-versa) translator, and I usually work with French and Catalan as well.
Although I have also worked as a medical interpreter, my are of expertise is media and communications because I have always loved languages and writing, so why not combine both?I use OmegaT and Smartcat as CAT tools, and when I am not translating or interpreting, you will probably find me writing articles or working on ”my baby”, an online magazine titled La Palabra Púrpura (The Purple Word).My motto is ”being stubborn is not always bad!” #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

I’m a  Spanish/English/Catalan-Russian translator and interpreter specialized in  legal, financial and business fields, as well as in tourism and international cooperation. Thanks to my professional experience I gained a very good knowledge of business systems of Russian and Spanish speaking cultures.Moreover, my specific skills include negotiating, intercultural communication and handling with cultural differences. All this allows me to offer a highly  professional translation and business localization services to my clients. Translation of marketing and creative texts is also my kind of work. I really enjoy my job that gives me the opportunity to bring closer different cultures, persons and ways of thinking.

#Russian #legalTranslation #RussianTranslator #RussianLegalTranslator #creativeRussian #RussianSpanishTranslation #RussianInterpreter #RussianLocalisator #EnglishRussianTranslator #internationalBusinessinRussia #localisationinRussian #RussianMarket #RussianTranscreation #crossCulturalCommunication 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

Living as a teenager among a melting pot of cultures in Silicon Valley, California, showed her that living languages and cultures and learning as much as her brain could absorb would become her motive. Life had other time schedule for her, though, and she had to go back to her home country. True to herself, she made the most of it and earned a position in the Town Hall as she began studying Technical Engineering, Humanities, Culinary Sciences, and earned a Diploma in Computer Development, among other milestones. However, her dream was just dormant. She earned her Degree in Translation and Interpreting, and all her experience has been put at the service of her translations ever since.

#translation #interpreting #legaltranslation #businesstranslation #sciencetranslation #securitytranslation #EU #eurojust #technicaltranslation #constructiontranslation #mechanicstranslation #computertranslation #Proz #insurancetranslation #engineeringtranslation #proofreading #English #Spanish #Spain #freelancetranslator 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

A member of the CIOL and chartered linguist, Kristina has been  working as a translator since 2013 after ten years in Learning and Development. She holds the Diploma in Translation with a distinction in law, has an eye for legal and business text, but also loves all things creative: marketing translation/transcreation, holiday rentals, the world of film and children’s literature. She has fulfilled her dream of translating a book for children - ‘The magic of my name‘. Likes to diversify  and enjoys learning (improving French at the moment), reading, cycling, Zumba and spending time with her favourite people.

#xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

Casey lived in Japan for more than a decade, and is very fond of the people and culture. With over 17 years of experience translating, he provides Japanese to English translations you can be sure are both accurate and natural-sounding. 
While in university he spent a year at International Christian University in Tokyo as an exchange student, and he graduated from the University of Tennessee with a degree in Japanese and World Business.
In his free time, he enjoys spending time with his wife, two daughters, and Jack Russell terrier, practicing martial arts, and traveling around the world.

#xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com
No alternative text description for this image

After finishing her five-year degree in Economics and Business Sciences, Silvia worked in different banks for 18.5 years. In 2015 she started her job as a translator, interpreter and proofreader and she finished her four-year degree in Translation and Interpreting in 2018. She has both postgraduate courses and master in Financial Advice and Financial Markets and she’s developing her current job as translator using all her experience during all these years. She’s very happy working and developing her skills in these fields. She loves travelling, dancing and spending time with friends and family. 
#legaltranslation #economictranslation #financetranslation #flow #happiness #translation #translator #languages #italian #english #french #spanish #world #work #passion #translationservices #law #web #tourism #industries #professionaltranslator #localization #proz #freelancer #people #business 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

Elisa writes: "I hold a Master’s degree in translation from SSIT in Italy, Pescara. I have worked as a translator since 2016, my areas of expertise are tourism, web and law, but I also have experience in the fields of social media, fashion, medicine and technique. I love languages and I am always willing to improve my knowledge and experience, which is the thing that I like most about my job. I am experienced in the use of CAT tools and subtitling software. When I am not translating, I teach English and French to children and adults." #translation #translator #languages #italian #english #french #spanish #world #work #passion #translationservices #law #web #tourism #industries #professionaltranslator #localization #proz #freelancer #people #business 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

Livia is a freelance translator and interpreter since 2018. Her working pairs are English < > Portuguese [Br], but as a language enthusiast she speaks a little French and Spanish as well. She also works as an independent consultant on corporate social responsibility, due to her experience in this field. Communication and sustainability have always been her passion and now she is thrilled to add translation into that mix.

#brazilexpert #sustainability #interculturalcommunication #subtitling #proofreading #contentwritting #consecutiveinterpretation #simultaneousinterpretation  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

Rodrigo Artiles Uriarte is a Russian and English to Basque and Spanish translator and interpreter based in the Czech Republic graduated from the University of the Basque Country.  As a translator he works in the fields of business, economy and medicine, although he has previously done some marketing and literature related translations. As an avid climber and mountaineer his love for outdoors and has taken him from the mountains of theBasque Country to Russia or even Svalbard. Whenever he’s not translating he can be found at the nearest climbing gym, crag or planning his next expedition to the polar regions. 
#xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

English as a foreign language has always been part of Andrea's life due to the fact that her mother is an English teacher. By the age of 12 she spoke English at a native level. She started translating articles at the age of 15, and when starting university studies, she had already had two global clients. From there it took a few years to master the fields she is most interested in: medical, legal and subtitling. Although these fields seem like opposites, they help her to balance her professional skills and creativity, thus enabling an ultimately better performance. 
#translation #translator #linguist #hungarian #medical#pharma #pharmaceutical #legal #IT #contracts #subtitling  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

The desire to broaden my horizons brought me to Berlin 6 years ago. My background is in Accounting and after many years working in that area, I took the leap to a career as a freelance translator in 2013. Since then I have completed many translation projects for clients across Europe in the fields of tourism and e-commerce. I dedicate part of my time as a volunteer translator for a humanitarian organization. I also enjoy helping others with their Spanish and welcome any chance to practice my German and French. Besides my passion for languages, I am a coffee lover. You might find me in a shabby cafe with my laptop.  #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

From her initial training as a speech therapist to her current career in both audiovisual and non-audiovisual medical translation, film and TV series subtitling and very  recently, book translation in the area of self development, Elisabeth’s passion  has always been language(s). She started out translating quilt magazine  articles then went back to university to get a Master’s degree in audiovisual translation, which opened new doors for her, especially the opportunity to work  with researchers on the history of health and medicine. She loves how diverse how projects are and she likes to think that, sometimes, her work changes lives… 
#medicaltranslator  #audiovisualtranslator  #quiltingismytherapy  #subtitling #traductionmedicale  #soustitrage #traductionaudiovisuelle #historyofmedicine #histoiredelamedecine #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

After gaining a degree in Italian from Manchester University, I lived in Naples for a few years. On returning to the UK (London), I initially spent five years within the Italian team of a renowned US investment bank, then six years in the international department of a Media Planning and Buying agency.
Eventually moving away from London to Sheffield, some 15 years later, meant that I could finally concentrate on translation as a full-time career. I love translating creative copy for high-end fashion brands, but I’m equally happy with down-to-earth business reports. I’m constantly learning about new things, and it amuses me to mull over my internet search history!

#marketing #fashion #luxury #napoli #tourism #cosmetics #media #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

I’m an English-Malay translator based in Malaysia with six years of experience under the Malaysian Institute of Translation and Book certification who want to utilise my knowledge and experience to become a skilful translator. Throughout my career, I have used CAT tools such as Across, GTS, MateCat, memoQ, Memsource, Qordoba, SAP, SDL Trados Studio 2014, Smartling, Subtitle Edit, Transit, Translation Management System (TMS), Translation Workspace (TWS), and XTRF Translation Management. I also want to challenge myself to learn new things by contributing to the company and community, supporting my family and achieving a successful career in the future.

#EnglishMalay #englishmalaytranslation #malayenglishtranslation #women #empowerment #malaymalaysia #translation #translator #translationservices #editing #proofreading  #review #subtitling #MTPE #transcription #linguistics #business #languages #freelance #freelancer #proz

For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

An expert at understanding, using and analyzing languages, Claudia has a solid academic background in linguistics and communication. Claudia’s translations about food, nutrition, and personal health, but also culture, psychology, and marketing are characterized by clarity, precision and elegance. In her 10 years as a professional translator, Claudia’s goal has always been to understand the needs and expectations of her clients, so that she can not only meet them, but even exceed them. Thanks to her good eye for detail, Claudia is also an excellent English proofreader and collaborates regularly with several European universities and institutions. 
#italiantranslator #italianenglish #academicproofreader #traduttrice #translatorslife #communication#intercultural #linguist #languagenerd #englishtranslator #slowtranslations#claudiatranslates

For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com

I’ve wanted to be a translator ever since I can remember. I spent part of my childhood in Spain, and at home we spoke English and Dutch. I have a degree in medical and biological translation from the Vertaalacademie in Maastricht. I’ve worked as a full-time freelancer since 1998. Last year, I decided I would like to help new translators, so I wrote a training manual on how to become a freelancer, and I organise courses and workshops for (new) translators. I am also the head admin of the Dutch FB group ‘Vertalerskoffiehoek’ (The Translators’ Coffee Corner). #xl8 #t9n #l10n #linguistics #translation #translator #proofreading  #business #languages #freelance #proz #localization #entrepreneur 
For details of how to be featured in this series, write to andrewmorris@proz.com
